short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It's easy to take hex color code from any object

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easy to get any color code in your browser frame.
User manual:
Step 1: Install extension
Step 2: Click on the green button "Pick color"
Step 3: Move to any object you want to get the color code for
This utility is free, if you find it interesting, please share it with your friends and relatives. Thank you!
